author: bridge-bot
content:
<stanbreadless> Hey, was there any update on whether chain id could be amended to be 32 bytes in EIP7702 to be future compatilbe with the other eips?

cc @lightclient (re @stanbreadless: Just in case to follow up: the feeHistory changes / EIP7762 don’t affect zkSync

Also, about the 32-byte chain id, I was referring to this ERC: https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/735 @lightclient)

author: bridge-bot
content: <lightclient> it’s already been updated to 32 bytes
